txt.en: 'Is there a queue for the forge or something?'
The leader of the Weaponsmith's Guild has asked you to craft a scabbard to fill an order from the leader of the Metalsmith's Guild.
The crafting recipes you must create can be bartered for from the Improved Recipes vendor.\n\nCraft a guild-pattern scabbard.
Execute the recipe for a guild-pattern scabbard
'Time to make the scabbard. Did you know I once saw a person try to draw a long sword from a scabbard worn on their back? Ridiculous.'
'Is there a queue for the forge or something?'
Executed the recipe for a guild-pattern scabbard
'Time to make the scabbard. Did you know I once saw a person try to draw a long sword from a scabbard worn on their back? Ridiculous.'
Turn in a guild-pattern scabbard ([placeholder]/[placeholder]) to Cottar Tunnelly
'Thanks for making our guild look great in the eyes of our cousins. I wouldn't be surprised if other guild leaders started to ask for their own custom weapons.'
Talk to the Weaponsmith's Guild Leader in Minas Morgul
Turn in a guild-pattern scabbard ([placeholder]/[placeholder]) to the Weaponsmith's Guild Leader in Minas Morgul
'Thanks for making our guild look great in the eyes of our cousins. I wouldn't be surprised if other guild leaders started to ask for their own custom weapons.'
